alert.note: Alert for Eastern Magic Valley; Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 3:34PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Blaine, western Power, northern Cassia and south central Minidoka Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 333 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Albion, or 10 miles south of Burley, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Burley, Heyburn, Lake Walcott, Oakley, Declo, Albion, Cold Water Rest Area, Yale Rest Area, Idahome, Mt Harrison, and Interstate 84 And 86 Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Magic Valley; Raft River Region; Southern Hills, Albion Mountains
